Watch videos about AI and bias.
Watch videos about AI and bias.
AI learns by looking at lots of pictures, words
But the data isn’t always fair.
Sometimes it has more of one kind of person
(like white men as CEOs) and less of others
So the AI copies what it sees,
even if it’s not right or fair!
So what are some bad consequences?
It can make unfair ideas feel real! If AI keeps
showing white people as smart and doesn’t show
people of color in those roles, we might start
to believe that it is true.
Also, biased AI doesn’t work the same for
everyone. For example, if an AI doctor was
trained using white men’s data, it might not
We should always think if AI output is biased.
And when we feel something is wrong...
